idCard.title: Guide to Upload ID Card Photo
idCard.description:
• Use the original ID card
  • Make sure the photo of your face on the ID card is clearly visible
  • Ensure the NIK number on the ID card is clearly visible
  • Position the ID card according to the provided guidelines

salarySlip.title: Guide to Upload Salary Slip Photo
salarySlip.description:
• Use the original salary slip
  • Make sure the photo is clear and legible
  • Ensure all relevant information is visible
  • Position the salary slip according to the provided guidelines

selfieIdCard.title: Guide to Upload Selfie with ID Card
selfieIdCard.description:
• Ensure you are in a well-lit area to avoid distracting shadows.
  • Position your face so it is clearly visible and proportionate within the application frame.
  • Ensure the ID card is fully covered and that relevant information is clearly readable.
  • Check the photo quality to ensure that your face and the information on the ID card are sharp and not blurry.

taxId.title: Guide to Upload Tax ID Photo
taxId.description:
• Use the original Tax ID card
  • Prepare the physical Tax ID to be photographed. Ensure the Tax ID is in good condition, not folded or damaged, and that the information displayed is clearly readable.
  • Place the Tax ID on a flat surface and ensure there is enough light to avoid distracting shadows.
  • Position the camera or phone at a good angle so that the Tax ID is clearly visible within the application frame.
  • Position the Tax ID card according to the provided guidelines.

review.modalStatement:
STATEMENT, AUTHORIZATION, AND CONSENT

  1. By signing the application form/accepting the card/signing the card/using the card, I hereby declare that the information provided is true.
  2. BRI has explained the benefits, costs, and risks associated with issuing the BRI Credit Card. I acknowledge and agree to this explanation.
  3. I have read, understood, and agreed to comply with and be bound by the 'Statement, Authorization, and Consent' in this application form, the privacy policy (https://bri.co.id/privacy), the credit card service guidelines (terms and conditions of the Credit Card), and the terms listed on the website https://bri.co.id/web/kartukredit/layanan, which together form an integral part of this application form, if this application is approved.
  4. I will not use the BRI Credit Card for illegal activities such as money laundering, terrorism financing, or other unlawful acts.
  5. For the purpose of issuing the BRI Credit Card, I grant authorization and/or consent to BRI as follows:
    1. To process the data/information and documents in the application form I submitted to BRI. The application form will become the property of BRI and cannot be reclaimed. BRI has the right not to process my application form if the data/information and documents are incomplete.
    2. To obtain and verify the accuracy of my data/information and documents from any party.
    3. To cancel card issuance, decline transactions, terminate card usage, revoke all card-related rights, or not renew the card if I use the card for transactions that violate applicable laws, including but not limited to:
      1. Using the card for improper purposes or engaging in illegal acts.
      2. Transactions suspected of Money Laundering and Terrorism Financing (AML & CFT).
      3. Using the card for purposes other than payment.
      4. Transactions indicating cash withdrawals/swipes at merchants or similar activities.
      Termination of credit card services does not eliminate any outstanding obligations (if any) that I must pay to BRI.
    4. To deliver the credit card (new/renewal) directly to me, whose name is printed on the card and at my registered address. If I am unavailable at the time of delivery, I authorize BRI to deliver the card to someone else at my address, provided that BRI records the delivery date and the recipient's identity.
    5. Not to be held responsible for any defects or deficiencies in the goods or services purchased with the BRI Credit Card. If disputes arise over such transactions, I am still obligated to pay the charges as listed on the billing statement.
    6. To temporarily or permanently block the BRI Credit Card in connection with my overdue obligations as a Cardholder and/or for investigation purposes related to card misuse.
    7. To block/debit/liquidate my savings accounts, including checking, deposits, and/or savings at BRI, to settle all obligations arising from the card usage.
    8. If I default on obligations arising from the card's use, I voluntarily agree to hand over my assets to BRI to settle my obligations.
    9. To use, share, and disclose my personal data/information with regulators, partners, third parties, or affiliates cooperating with BRI for non-commercial purposes.
    10. To inform me about products, programs, and services related to BRI via written media (electronic or non-electronic).
    11. To transfer any credit balance on the card due to overpayments to my registered BRI savings account.
    12. To collect payments for my obligations arising from card usage, directly or through third parties appointed by BRI.
    13. To debit my credit card account for disputed transactions if BRI confirms them as valid.
    14. To transfer collection rights or credit card facilities to third parties in accordance with applicable laws.
  6. I am responsible for the security of the credit card and transactions, including misuse, forgery, and duplication due to my negligence, including but not limited to:
    1. Delayed/failure to inform BRI of changes to personal data (address, phone number, email, etc.).
    2. Delayed/failure to report a lost credit card to BRI.
    3. Disclosing credit card data, OTP codes, CVV, PIN, and other personal data to third parties.
    4. Delayed/failure to cancel recurring transactions, causing continuous payments.
  7. I have the right to dispute transactions billed to me within 30 calendar days from the transaction date.
  8. For lost cards, I will immediately contact BRI Contact Center 1500017.
  9. I agree to pay all obligations arising from card use by the due date.
  10. I will not transfer my BRI Credit Card payment obligations to others.
  11. All records held by BRI serve as valid and binding evidence unless proven otherwise.
  12. This agreement complies with applicable laws, including OJK regulations.
  13. The authorizations in this form are irrevocable until BRI declares all obligations settled.
  14. BRI may change credit card terms at any time with prior notification based on applicable regulations.
